Desc.eng: Sir, it’s about that huge stack of research documents we found in the Testing Facility. The “Promethean Dossier”, as I like to call it.
Are you sure that the material can live up to this pompous name?

Undeniably, sir. It’s the personal research journal of none other than Professor Fulmigati. The first few glimpses were enough to ascertain that this material could change the way we look at Weird Science.
And what are you planning to do with it?

I’m going to study these documents as thoroughly as I can, of course. I’ll write down the digest of my discoveries into a research journal, also called the Promethean Dossier. I’ll keep you updated every time I’m finished with a new entry. (Go to the Journal, see Prometheus.)
